short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This plugin allow to share a webpage on fb, twitter, share link on twitter, share selected text on twitter, share image on twitter

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: From this you can able to share any link on twitter, share any image on facebook, share any page on facebook or twitter easily by right click on site or on any link or on any image.
